channel.title: Help with textpad and source
channel.description: hi, i'm having problems with textpad (i don't know what to do with it) and my source. I downloaded testscape and then i need textpad. I have tried on my windows 98 computer i can download the source, but not textpad. On my windows xp computer, i have tried downloading the source but it won't work and keeps saying "what do u want firefox to do with this file" and opens a blank tab. This is a little wierd but if anyonee can tell me what to do preferrbly on 98 computer but xp would be good to. ALSO EXPLAIN BETTER WITH LITTLE CONFUSION PLEASE!! Thanks, Aflxnhe1

i’m having problems with textpad (i don’t know what to do with it) and my source. I downloaded testscape and then i need textpad.
